attributes.action: Prove whether David Icke is correct about the Queen being a lizard
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
David Icke has made serious allegations about the Queen and royal family being hybrid alien/lizards. If he is correct then we are all in trouble. As such we the undersigned demand that the Queen take a blood test to prove herself human once and for all.
If she is found to be a lizard then we should test all members of the royal family

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
